name: The Hunter
description:
Ludum Dare 37 Entry: The Hunter

HEADPHONES REQUIRED

Someone is stalking you...

Find the key and escape before he finds you.

Listening is your only defense.

Press "I" to start the game

Tips:

-The hunter only moves when you move

-Throwing a rock to bait the hunter to go a certain direction

-Throw a rock and wait for him to pass you

-Don't run too fast or the hunter can hear you running

Controls:

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

Q - Strafe Left

E - Strafe Right

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

I - Throw Rock

O - Wait
